name: Matt LeMay
byline: writer, musician, recording engineer and product manager. He is the co-founder of Constellate Data, a consultancy that helps organizations use data to understand people. As a product manager, Matt led the consumer product team at analytics startup Bitly, and worked as a senior PM at music startup Songza (acquired by Google). As a musician, Matt released two albums with his band Get Him Eat Him, and has played with bands including Kleenex Girl Wonder, The Moles and the Capstan Shafts.
